section:
== Executing tests
To run a Robotium test use the same approach you use to run Eclipse, right-click the test class and select menu:Run-As[Android JUnit Test]
You can run Robotium tests from the command line, too.
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="./examples/robotium/background.txt[] ----
